trans-unit.source: Changes the color space of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 變更的色彩空間<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For XAML usage information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: XAML 使用量資訊，請參閱[ColorConvertedBitmap 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ColorConvertedBitmap implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: ColorConvertedBitmap 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 在物件初始化期間只能發生在屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>發出信號，初始設定開始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>來表示已完成初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: ColorConvertedBitmap objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用建立的 ColorConvertedBitmap 物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29>建構函式會自動初始化，並且忽略屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29>

trans-unit.source: A ColorConvertedBitmap is never cached.
trans-unit.target: ColorConvertedBitmap 永遠不會快取。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用方式，請參閱 < 備註 >

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>使用這個建構函式所建立，您必須執行之間的屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref>類別使用指定的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>使用這個建構函式建立的物件會自動初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
